title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

title: iphone 16 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max features a stunning 6.9-inch display, advanced triple-camera system, and A18 chip for lightning-fast performance. With up to 2TB storage, it's perfect for capturing pro-level photos, videos, and immersive experiences.

title: Electric Kettle
